contest-event.event-date:
May 21, 1955 D Glasgow Charities Contest
Glasgow Charities Contest 0 Other
glasgow-charities-contest
None
Kelvingrove Park, Glasgow March contest 1st Clydebank, 2nd Newtongrange Lothian. Best section 2 band - Whitburn. Best section 3 band - Airdrie Old. Best section 4 band - RNVR Clyde. Best trombone - W.Ward - Clydebank. Best cornet - T.Clucas - Clydebank. Best euphonium - J.Blackburn - Renfrew. Best horn - B.Thompson - Scottish CWS. Deportment 1st Whitburn. 9 bands competed.
March 17, 2013, 11:49 a.m. April 23, 2019, 1:38 p.m.
1 Clydebank Burgh Band John Hoggans The Flying Dutchman [unknown arranger]

3 Renfrew Burgh Band John Peckham
4 Whitburn Band Herbert Kearsley
5 Monklands Youth Concert Brass George Laidlaw
